input.sentences: we went on a tour of this aircraft museum . i guess they started with the oldest first .
we saw the space shuttle from a distance and it was magnificent .
the propulsion on the shuttle was massive .
the other aircraft we were less familiar with | but by no means unimpressed .
we really enjoyed the glow of this plane . it was our favorite of the day .
output.sentences: We went to the museum yesterday to learn about the history of airplanes.
We got to see a space shuttle, which was super impressive.
The sheer size of the shuttle was massive in size.
The rest of the museum wasn't so impressive.
It was kind of neat to see the different styles of airplanes from different parts of the world,
